text: Kroll is a 1991 Polish crime thriller movie by first time director Władysław Pasikowski. It stars Olaf Lubaszenko, Bogusław Linda, Dariusz Kordek, Cezary Pazura and Maciej Kozłowski. It was distributed by Agencja Produkcji Filmowej. ==Other websites== * Category:1991 crime thriller movies Category:Polish crime movies Category:Polish thriller movies Category:Movies directed by Władysław Pasikowski Category:Movies set in Poland
title: Kroll (movie)
